title: The Smashing Pumpkins: Oceania 3D Live in NYC (Video 2013)
overview: Tracks:  01 Intro  02 Quasar  03 Panopticon  04 The Celestials  05 Violet Rays  06 My Love is Winter  07 One Diamond, One Heart  08 Pinwheels  09 Oceania  10 Pale Horse  11 The Chimera  12 Glissandra  13 Inkless  14 Wildflower  15 Space Oddity  16 X.y.u  17 Disarm  18 Tonite Reprise  19 Tonight, Tonight  20 Bullet with Butterfly Wings  21 The Dream Machine  22 Hummer  23 Ava Adore  24 Cherub Rock  25 Zero
storyline: The Smashing Pumpkins Oceania 3D IN NYC was filmed last December at New York City's Barclay's Arena, where the group performed their new Oceania album in its entirety, along with a selection of the band's biggest hits. The PUMPKINS' shows included visuals prepared by Sean Evans, whose most recent project was assisting Roger Waters on the newest staging of "The Wall." THE PUMPKINS used new technology in video-mapping to create something new and previously unseen, all of which is expertly captured in 3D and recorded 5.1 Surround Sound for the ultimate audio visual sensory experience!
